```{r setup, include=FALSE}

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE);

require('userfriendlyscience');
safeRequire('here');

dataPath <- here::here('results - data');
dataFileRegEx <- 'survey_722821_R_data_file';
dataLoadScriptName <- 'survey_722821_R_syntax_file.R';
  
categoricalQuestions <- 'sex';

dat <- dat.raw <-
  importLimeSurveyData(dataPath = dataPath,
                       datafileRegEx = dataFileRegEx,
                       scriptfile = file.path(dataPath,
                                              dataLoadScriptName),
                       categoricalQuestions = categoricalQuestions);

```
